pr_title: Warn when JAX-RS @Path is used along with MP Health annotations

timeline.bodyText: MP Health 3.0 will remove the deprecated @Health annotation, but while we still have it I think we should log a warning for that one too?
timeline.author: jmartisk

timeline.message:
Warn when JAX-RS @Path is used along with MP Health annotations

It's not unreasonable for users to expect these annotations to work
together, so let's be explicit that they don't.

Resolves: #10720
